featured.text: Recent or repeated exposure to a song or even a small part of a song can also trigger earworms, as can word associations, such as a phrase similar to the lyrics of a song.
From Binet’s work, the phrase “intelligence quotient” (“IQ”) entered the English vocabulary.

definition.zh_def: 短語；由兩個或多個單詞組成的語言單位，通常表達一個特定的意思。
definition.en_def: A group of words that work together to convey a particular meaning.
definition.example: She used a common phrase to express her feelings.
